title: The Sentinel that could, and did.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
It was a simple request thought I: 
_"Go scout up near red side's blue buff, while we take dragon."_

but unbeknownst to me, the little sentinel was of Olympic quality material, and instead of sullying itself with the menial task of making sure we don't die while in enemy territory, it took off hurriedly to train for the upcoming marathon _(quite in the opposite direction of course)_, 

Quite to the astonishment of myself, not only did it jog off in the wrong direction, but it travelled somewhat farther than its allocated distance, going from the mouth of dragon pit, to well past the tier 2 mid lane turret. A true marathon indeed.
It made its full 3 laps, from dragon pit, to turret before expiring. 

I wish it well in all its endeavours, but am left with the parting thought of: 
_"WTF Just happened?"_

replies.body: YAY SENTINEL! XD The ai are becoming sentient D:> lol sad though T.T
The old dead and forgotten champ glitches. Cant even remember the last time I've seen a Kalista.
